desc.message: Adds infinite scrolling, site icons, server locations, View image button, Download image button and sticks header to top.

stick_header_text.message: Stick header on top of the page

unload_pages_text.message: Unload pages that are off-screen (less RAM consumption)

download_imgs_path_help_title.message: The path to the folder in the downloads folder, into which downloaded images will go. May contain subfolders. Must not contain symbols prohibited by the operating system. If the folder does not exist, it will be created on the first download. Leave empty to download images into the default folder. Example: !Google/Images

rate_text.message: ⭐️ Rate this extension if you like it

link_to_google_plus_group_text.message: 🖼️ Download free Chrome extensions and themes

donate_link_text.message: 💖 Support the development of this extension by donating any amount via PayPal
